name: Greek Pantheon
description: The Greek pantheon encompasses the gods and goddesses of ancient Greek mythology, centered on Mount Olympus and featuring the twelve Olympians who ruled after the Titanomachy.

name: Norse Pantheon
description: The Norse pantheon includes the Aesir and Vanir gods of Scandinavian mythology, centered in Asgard and featuring stories of creation, heroism, and the prophesied end of the world known as Ragnarok.

name: Egyptian Pantheon
description: The Egyptian pantheon encompasses the gods and goddesses of ancient Egypt, featuring creation deities, solar worship, the afterlife, and the eternal struggle between order (Ma'at) and chaos (Isfet).
